page.title: 08CHILDREN'S LEISURE
page.content: Sarah & Joanne sometimes go into town and buy new clothes and things for their mums. Tracy goes for a{swimming lesson}at the{Leisure Centre. Indarpal & Davinder go to a{Saturday {School}to learn how to speak and write {Punjabi.} Melanie goes to her grandma's to help her with jobs around the house. On the way back she goes to the {Library}to change her books. Zaheer and his brother have to get up at 8 o'clock to go to{Urdu School.} Kirstie and Lisa go into town to buy groceries, then they do some{window {shopping,}looking at the clothes & shoe shops. When Phillip wakes up he plays {computer chess. Sarah Hind always has a fry-up for breakfast on Saturday.
